# Haxe Roundup № 117

Via twitter

New blog post : Using the Remote Control Library with NME by Joshua Granick

Slides from the talk Game Development using Haxe and NME from FITC Screens12 are now available by Joshua Granick

Chrome extension type definitions have been updated to v22 by Tong

Via rss

New blog post : Elapsed time between two dates in Haxe by Ashiq Alibhai

Via haxe mailing list

New tool for generating spritesheets with plans of supporting NME. Currently only supports PNG or Starling output
